@graph.name: Diwanshu .

member.description:
• Led the development of key features such as Mailbox, Google Calendar sync,
Gmail integration, SMTP Integration and a lead finder using Google Maps,
resulting in a 20% boost in user engagement.
• Developed an end-to-end service for sending and managing email queues,
implementing robust queue management and ensuring reliable delivery,
improving system efficiency and user communication.
• Utilized Node.js, Next.js, BullMQ, and Cron Jobs for backend development,
while working with PostgreSQL and Prisma for database management. Integrated
third-party APIs like Google Calendar and Google Maps, developed marketing
automation features (drip campaigns, lead finder), and Hands-on experience
with cloud technologies.

@graph.description:
I have experience creating web application solutions as a Mern Stack Developer. I am quite knowledgeable about the entire Web development life cycle and am passionate about coming up with original solutions.

I've developed, tested, and deployed web apps with success because to my solid technical background and ability to work well in teams. I am well-versed in a number of frameworks, including Node.js, and React, Next.js and I have worked with languages including JavaScript, HTML, CSS. In addition, I have expertise integrating APIs and web services as well as developing and building databases in MongoDB. I have strong communication and problem-solving skills, and I feel at ease working in an Agile atmosphere.
